nodes.bodyText: This error type is something we missed in previous releases. I think it is better to correct this now. There is an issue if the users handled it at a low level.
Or we will reuse existing error type for patch release and correct it in minor release
Yeah, +1. We'll still have the details right? Only the reason will be incorrect.
Are we using this constant anywhere? Shall we rename it?
This is a temporary fix for a patch release. I did it this way to minimize the changes. I introduced a new error type called ProcessExecError in the master branch.
